title: U.S.: Citi ThankYou® Preferred Card Now Offers Double Points on Dining Out and Entertainment at No Annual Fee
summary: New York - Citi's ThankYou Preferred card now rewards cardmembers for doing what they love by offering two points per dollar spent on dining out and entertainment at no annual fee. New and existing ThankYou Preferred cardmembers earn two ThankYou® Points per dollar on dining at restaurants and entertainment purchases from takeout to fine dining, music downloads to movie rentals, as well as tickets to sports and entertainment events. ThankYou Preferred cardmembers will continue to earn one point per dollar on other purchases.
tag-1: U.S.: Citi ThankYou® Preferred Card Now Offers Double Points on Dining Out and Entertainment at No Annual Fee
tag-3: New York – Citi's ThankYou Preferred card now rewards cardmembers for doing what they love by offering two points per dollar spent on dining out and entertainment at no annual fee. New and existing ThankYou Preferred cardmembers earn two ThankYou® Points per dollar on dining at restaurants and entertainment purchases from takeout to fine dining, music downloads to movie rentals, as well as tickets to sports and entertainment events. ThankYou Preferred cardmembers will continue to earn one point per dollar on other purchases.
tag-4: "We've seen and heard that our cardmembers enjoy dining and entertainment often and want to be rewarded for these purchases," said Chris Fred, Head of Rewards Product Management, Citi Cards. "ThankYou Preferred now enables cardmembers to earn points faster while enjoying the food and entertainment they love: whether they are buying lunch, enjoying a night out, or taking the family to a ballgame."
tag-5: In addition, Citi announced a lineup of special events exclusively for Citi ThankYou cardmembers that will begin in August and take place in select U.S. major cities. The only way to access these unique experiences is by purchasing tickets with a Citi ThankYou card. More information on the events lineup and how to purchase tickets can be found at www.citi.com/thankyoucards.
tag-6: Added Chris Fred: "These events have been designed exclusively for customers with a Citi ThankYou card and give them unique opportunities to see the nation's top talent in comedy, music and sports by using their ThankYou card."

tag-8: Existing ThankYou Preferred cardmembers can enjoy these benefits immediately. They will also continue to earn an Anniversary Bonus on purchases until their next cardmember annual anniversary date. Existing cardmembers who are interested in receiving a chip-enabled card can request a new card via Customer Service by calling 1-800-THANKYOU (1-800-842-6596), option 1.
tag-9: More information including how to apply for the Citi ThankYou Preferred card can be found at www.citi.com/thankyoucards.
